Description: As close to new as you will find. Beautiful 5A Carved Maple Top; Dark Cherry burst with gorgeous lines. Used a handful of hours in a smoke-free studio. This instrument has been maliciously cared for and has spent almost its entire life in a case. Since its launch in 2007, the EVH brand has had one mission—to take the tools Eddie Van Halen uses to create his groundbreaking guitar work and place them in your hands. Over 35 years of innovation and experience were injected into the creation of the original Wolfgang USA, which is also offered in a distinctive sans-tremolo version. Tweaked for high performance, the EVH Wolfgang USA HT is a highly responsive and huge-sounding guitar that delivers no-holds-barred, pedal-to-the-metal rock and roll. Premium features include a basswood body with arched maple top, bolt-on quartersawn maple neck with oil finish and dual graphite reinforcement rods, 12”-16” compound radius ebony fingerboard with 22 vintage stainless frets and pearloid block inlays, (dot inlays on Stealth finish), five-ply black/white body and headstock binding, dual direct mount EVH Wolfgang Humbucking pickups with three-way toggle switching, EVH custom low-friction volume (500k) and high-friction tone (250k) potentiometers, Gotoh hardtail bridge with fine tuners and Floyd Rose® locking nut. Ready to navigate the twists and turns of your music with ease, the Wolfgang USA HT is available in a variety of elegant and classic finishes with matching headstocks, black master volume and tone controls and either black or chrome hardware.
Title: EVH Wolfgang USA Electric Guitar
